thread.title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle put on an affectionate display as they attend wedding in Jamaica
thread.title_full: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle put on an affectionate display as they attend wedding in Jamaica

author: Lydia Willgress
title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle put on an affectionate display as they attend wedding in Jamaica
text:
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle put on an affectionate display as they attend wedding in Jamaica The American actress was spotted with the Prince outside the ceremony Credit: MEGA Lydia Willgress 4 March 2017 â€¢ 12:17pm 
P rince Harry and Meghan Markle put on an affectionate display as they celebrated the wedding of one of the royal's closest friends in Jamaica. 
The American actress was spotted with her arm around the Prince outside the ceremony of his Eton friend Tom 'Skippy' Inskip at the Hopewell Baptist Church in Montego Bay on Friday. In an intimate moment, Miss Markle was seen with her arm around the Prince Credit: MEGA 
L ater, in another intimate moment, the couple were seen holding hands as they sat and relaxed with other guests at a table. 
Miss Markle, 35, wore a floor-length black and yellow printed dress, believed to be by Erdem, for the ceremony, which she matched with a nude clutch bag and large black sunglasses. The couple were celebrating Tom 'Skippy' Inskip's marriage to his long-time girlfriend, literary agent Laura Hughes-Young Credit: MEGA 
The Duchess was also spotted in a flower-patterned dress by the same designer during an official outing in January. The couple entering the church on Friday Credit: MEGA 
T he Prince, meanwhile, wore a navy suit and yellow corsage, which matched Miss Markle's dress, as he celebrated Mr Inskip's marriage to his long-time girlfriend, literary agent Laura Hughes-Young. 
The couple are believed to have held the part of the event at the Round Hill Hotel and Villas, a private 110-acre plantation style resort first built as a colony of cottages for the rich, famous and glamorous of the 1950s. The church, where Prince Harry and Miss Markle attended a wedding on Friday Credit: Facebook 
I t is thought to be the first time the Prince and Miss Markle have been pictured together at an event. 
They were spotted leaving a London theatre together in December, having watching The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time. 
T hey were also pictured holding hands after leaving a club in Soho together at the beginning of February. Prince Harry with Mr Inskip in 2007 Credit: Mark Stewart 
M iss Markle married her former husband, producer Trevor Engleson, in Jamaica in 2011 but they split two years later before getting divorced. 
The Prince and Miss Markle , who stars in the hit US legal drama series Suits, have been dating since last summer. Erdem, believed to be the designer of Miss Markle's dress, is a favourite of the Duchess of Cambridge's, who this week wore a metallic design for a reception at Buckingham Palace Credit: Jonathan Brady/PA Wire 
T heir relationship is said to be serious, despite the fact the fact that he lives at Kensington Palace she lives in Canada, where her career has taken off since she landed the role in 2011. 
Kensington Palace has so far declined to comment on the couple's visit to Jamaica.
